name: Pinkfong Coloring Fun
description: Get all creative with Kids Coloring Fun! Have a special coloring experience with more than 220 coloring pages and various coloring tools including stickers. You can also make cards with your photos!   FEATURES - 11 favorite themes from animals to princesses  - Over 220 pages to color and play with - Various colors selected for each theme - Amazing tools including brushes, glitters and patterns  - Adorable stickers to decorate your paintings - Special photo frame pack for special fun - Easy-to-use navigation - Interactive effects children just love - Optimized for all smartphones and tablets
